channel.title: Silly Connections
channel.description:
[b]I have my server up and I used utorrent for portforwarding...
I also have hamachi and told my friend to join my server and the client loads up perfectly on his side but cant log in and my side gets very laggy(508). My JDK and EV are set up aswell. When i try to regeiter a new server it always sais its offline!
Please help...I have a D-Link WBR-1310 how should i put my port forwarding as maybe im doing it wrong.[/b]
